LightningComponentBundle.description: Konfigurerbar komponent som viser en liste over muligheter fra en spesifisert listevisning. Støtter navigering til detaljer og handlinger som redigering og opprettelse av nye records.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: The API name of a supported object.

property.name: listViewApiName
property.label: List View API Name
property.description: The API name of a list view, such as AllAccounts.

property.name: titleFieldInput
property.label: Primary field
property.description: Use field API name. Obs! CASE sesnsitive fieldnames!

property.name: detailFieldInput
property.label: Secondary field
property.description: Use field API name. For lookup fields use SOQL notation relation_name.fieldname, for instance Account__r.Name (max 1 relation level). Obs! CASE sesnsitive fieldnames!

property.name: warningCriteriaInput
property.label: Warning icon: Display condition
property.description: Boolean expression using {{fieldName}} syntax for field references. Obs! CASE sesnsitive fieldnames!

property.name: warningTextInput
property.label: Warning icon: Tooltip
property.placeholder: Denne oppføringen er eldre enn 1 dag og er i "Ny henvendelse" stadiet.

property.name: helpText
property.label: Component: Tooltip
property.placeholder: Dette er en hjelpetekst for komponentet.
